arts.ttl: Dortmund submit bid for Chelsea youngster (Sky)
arts.sum: Alongside reported interest in Rayan Cherk, and the imminent arrival of Daniel Svenssoni, Borussia Dortmund have submitted a bid for 21-year-old Chelsea midfielder Carney Chukwuemeka, as per reports from Sky.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund make loan approach for out of favour Chelsea star - with Blues determined his £40m release clause is met to sanction permanent sale
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: An option to buy could be included, though Chelsea have been looking for his release clause to be met in order to sanction a permanent sale.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: The offer Borussia Dortmund have made Chelsea for Carney Chukwuemeka ahead of deadline day
arts.sum: TBR Football understands that Borussia Dortmund have made a formal offer for Carney Chukwuemeka ahead of deadline day on Monday. Chukwuemeka has been linked with...

arts.ttl: Mike Tullberg bids farewell to Borussia Dortmund: “I hope they can build on this.”
arts.sum: After the team secured its first Bundesliga win of the 2025 calendar year, Borussia Dortmund sporting director Sebastian Kehl and interim trainer Mike Tullberg were finally able to breathe a sigh of relief.

arts.ttl: Dortmund make loan move for Chelsea's Chukwuemeka
arts.sum: Chelsea midfielder Carney Chukwuemeka, 21, could move to Germany on loan with Borussia Dortmund to get his career back on track after an ill-fated spell at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund edge past Heidenheim as Serhou Guirassy strikes again
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy scored in his fourth consecutive game in all competitions as Dortmund secured a narrow away win at Heidenheim - in their final match under interim coach Mike Tullberg before Niko Kovač's arrival. Serhou Guirassy's first-half strike was his ninth goal in the Bundesliga this season.

arts.ttl: ‘Maybe’: Arsenal could look to sign ‘excellent’ player from Borussia Dortmund – journalist
arts.sum: Arsenal do have work to do in the transfer window, but with just days to go until the window closes, the Gunners may not get...

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund reach agreement with Daniel Svensson
arts.sum: Multiple sources are now reporting that Borussia Dortmund are close to signing a new left-back.

arts.ttl: Transfer News: Green Light for Cherki and BVB Look to Denmark for Left Back Reinforcements
arts.sum: A transfer target of this summer, Rayan Cherki, has been linked with Dortmund, and Kovac has seemingly already given the green light for the technically gifted Frenchman. Now it looks like something might finally happen, and the player in question is the 22-year old Swede, Daniel Svensson from FC Nordsjælland.

arts.ttl: Dortmund agree personal terms with Swedish international
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Borussia Dortmund have reached an agreement with Swedish international Daniel Svensson, who plays for Danish side FC Nordsjælland.
